title: Love Island's Chris Taylor hilariously mocks Caroline Flack as he recreates her racy naked snap
text:
Chris Taylor hilariously mocked Caroline Flack as he recreated her recent nude Instagram snap on Wednesday.

The Love Island star, 28, stripped off and crossed his legs so as to copy her exact pose on the kitchen counter.

With a bottle of Lambrini in one hand and and a glass of wine in the other, Chris mimicked Caroline sipping pink champagne as he posed up a storm for the camera.

The reality hunk, who was well known for his pranks during his time of Love Island, tagged cleaning influence Mrs Hinch in his caption as he wrote: '@mrshinchhome know any decent disinfectants?

'Else I’m gonna need a new kitchen. Big mood this @carolineflack #whoworeitbetter #mood #lambrinigirls #getthesurfacewipesout.'

Seeing the funny side, Caroline was quick to comment: 'Hahahahaha' to which Chris replied with a smiley face emoji.

Earlier this week, Caroline bared all in the racy celebratory snap, which was shared in a nod to finishing up her latest project.

The television personality had her honey-hued tresses swept over her shoulder as she balanced the half-empty pink champagne bottle on her raised knee, and sipped the bubbly from a large glass.

In a caption alongside the photo, Caroline wrote: 'Quite a week .. we’re having a little wrap party.'

Elsewhere on her social media platform, the Love Island host shared her struggle with anxiety.

Taking to Instagram on Monday, Caroline admitted although she finds her feelings hard to discuss, she was speaking out in a bid to inspire her 2.3 million followers to be kinder to one another.

Tempestuous: It comes after the star's relationship with boyfriend Lewis Burton, 28, seemed to be on the rocks as they engaged in a furious argument during their Spanish holiday last week

Caroline explained: 'I wanted to write something about mental health day last week but I was knee deep in work. And some days it’s hard to write your feelings of your not in the right place.

'The last few weeks I’ve been in a really weird place... I find it hard to talk about it .. I guess it’s anxiety and pressure of life ... and when I actually reached out to someone they said I was draining. I feel like this is why some people keep their emotions to themselves.

'I certainly hate talking about my feelings. And being a burden is my biggest fear.... I’m lucky to be able to pick myself up when things feel s**t. But what happens if someone can’t . Be nice to people. You never know what’s going on . Ever'.

Caroline previously revealed she struggles with her anxiety more when she has free time.

Speaking on Loose Women last year, she explained: 'Weirdly the anxiety I got more when I'm not working. Work takes away my anxiety, doing live TV takes away anything else. Being on stage I'm less nervous than just being me.'
